data.persona: I am the son of the king.  I am the rightful heir.  I will marry a princess.
data.description:
You are in the Tower.
This outside tower is made from big stones. It is grey with wood trim. There is one glass window that is used as a lookout tower.
There's a crossbow, some wood trim, a spear, some big stones, a castle, a cannon, a lookout tower, and a sword of the guards here.
A messenger and a captain of the guard are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a high priest's robe.

            "persona": "I am fleet footed and swift. I ran faster than any other child in the village, and I can still beat any of them today. data.short_motivation: I should go out of the tower to reach the messenger
data.mid_motivation: I should get pass the the big stone
data.long_motivation: I have to view the path from the look out tower to manage exiting the tower and drop robe to exit the tower and hug the messenger
